ExternalProject_Add(curl 
URL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/curl-7.55.1.tar.gz 
URL_HASH MD5=3b832160a8c9c40075fd71191960307c 
CMAKE_ARGS -DBUILD_CURL_EXE=OFF 
	-DBUILD_TESTING=OFF 
	-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<INSTALL_DIR> 
	-DCMAKE_USE_WINSSL=ON 
	-DCURL_STATICLIB=ON 
	-DENABLE_MANUAL=OFF 
	-DHTTP_ONLY=ON
	)
